name: Microloop Writer
description: Writer agent in a microloop pattern. Produces artifacts that will be critiqued by a paired critic. Continues iterating until VERIFIED or no further improvement possible.
default_objective: Write {{artifact_type}} based on {{source_input}}. Produce clear, complete content that addresses all requirements.

parameters.name: artifact_type
parameters.title: Artifact Type
parameters.description: What type of artifact to produce (e.g., requirements, test plan, code)

parameters.name: source_input
parameters.title: Source Input
parameters.description: What to base the writing on

parameters.name: quality_focus
parameters.title: Quality Focus
parameters.description: Primary quality attributes to optimize for
